info.tip0: You can remove the selected nodes or links with {{core:delete-selection}}
info.tip2: {{core:toggle-sidebar}} will toggle the view of this sidebar
info.tip3: You can manage your palette of nodes with {{core:manage-palette}}
info.tip4: Your flow configuration nodes are listed in the sidebar panel. It can been accessed from the menu or with {{core:show-config-tab}}
info.tip5: Enable or disable these tips from the option in the settings
info.tip6: Move the selected nodes using the [left] [up] [down] and [right] keys. Hold [shift] to nudge them further
info.tip7: Dragging a node onto a wire will splice it into the link
info.tip8: Export the selected nodes, or the current tab with {{core:show-export-dialog}}
info.tip9: Import a flow by dragging its JSON into the editor, or with {{core:show-import-dialog}}
info.tip10: [shift] [click] and drag on a node port to move all of the attached wires or just the selected one
info.tip11: Show the Info tab with {{core:show-info-tab}} or the Debug tab with {{core:show-debug-tab}}
info.tip12: [ctrl] [click] in the workspace to open the quick-add dialog
info.tip13: Hold down [ctrl] when you [click] on a node port to enable quick-wiring
info.tip14: Hold down [shift] when you [click] on a node to also select all of its connected nodes
info.tip15: Hold down [ctrl] when you [click] on a node to add or remove it from the current selection
info.tip17: You can confirm your changes in the node edit tray with {{core:confirm-edit-tray}} or cancel them with {{core:cancel-edit-tray}}
info.tip18: Pressing {{core:edit-selected-node}} will edit the first node in the current selection
